-1.title: Hip Hop: A New Age
-1.plot: From Iggy Azalea to Macklelmore, the cast will explore if race and class affect the legitimacy of certain artists in the genre, and also jam out with special musical guest.

imdb.plot outline: The Living Room is an online talk show series featuring vibrant young adults exploring taboo topics and current events inspired from excerpts in trending music, films, culture, and social media. It also a home for rising artists and professionals in the Washington DC Metro Area to join our conversation and share their work. The Living Room is fresh, fun, funky, and unpolitically correct. Our couch is a place for transparent conversations on love, career, and the culture of our generation.
imdb.title: The Living Room
plot: _The Living Room_ (qv) is an online talk show series featuring vibrant young adults exploring taboo topics and current events inspired from art, culture, and media.::_The Living Room_ (qv)
